ValidationRule.description:
CSSF-378
It should be able to redirect cases to all queues except the below SAS Automation Process SAS Site Forms SAS Automation Queue
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( AND( ISCHANGED(OwnerId), OR( $Profile.Name = "Business User", $Profile.Name = "Vendor" ), OR( Owner:Queue.QueueName = 'SAS Automation Process', Owner:Queue.QueueName = 'SAS Site Forms', Owner:Queue.QueueName = 'SAS Automation Queue' ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot manually assign cases to this queue.
